square with.translation[0].definitions[0: if you square two ideas, statements etc with each other or if they square with each other, they are considered to be in agreement
square something with your conscience (=make yourself believe that what you are doing is morally right)
His story simply does not square with the facts.
How do you square that with your religious beliefs?
square with.translation[0].definitions[1: to persuade someone to agree to something
I’ll take the day off if I can square it with my boss.
square with.translation[1].definitions[0: to arrange something with someone by persuading them to agree to it or allow it
I’ll take the day off if I can square it with my boss.
